website_summaries.verdict: The reasonably sized Samsung Galaxy Note 10 is the answer for sketchers and note-takers who can't quite handle the larger Note 10+.
cons: Tall, narrow screen isn't the best for sketching on

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's choice
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend buying this. Bought it from official amazon and it was marked "Amazon's choice". To my surprise, the seal was broken and resealed on top (see picture). I returned it immediately. Nealy 20 days later now, still waiting for my £600 refund.
customer_reviews.author: azed

customer_reviews.title: IPhone killer
customer_reviews.text: Stunning phone. This phone has the best camera bar none, it's utterly amazing. So many modes, such clarity in the images and, a night mode that actually works. The phone itself is just the business, super fast for browsing, lightweight in the hand and, not massively big. There is no phone on the market that can compete with this. If you've just purchased an iPhone, then take it back as this is the best phone out there
customer_reviews.author: Inked bloodlust

customer_reviews.title: Good device as a smart device, but signal strength is terrible on Vodafone UK
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, amazing speed on wifi due to the WiFi 6 protocol, but 4G network signal is terrible, where i had full 4G signal with my Oneplus 7T with the same simcard, the note 10 is struggling to get 4G, even H+ signal is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Arpad

customer_reviews.title: Original seal broken and hidden under a different seal!!
customer_reviews.text: Original seal was broken and covered with a different one, see picture. Not happy about this at all, would like an explanation.... Hope it has the 24months samsung warranty as said because the broken original screen was concerning. Phone didn’t look used though, had original packiging, accessories and screen protector, plastic foils around the back and edges. Fast delivery with prime, ordered in lovely aura glow color. Phone works fine, without any problem, battery lasts a day. Overall happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to upgrade from an s9 plus. This is my first Samsung Note as I always go for the S series. Lovely display and fantastic battery life. At first I wasn't sure if it was the right phone for me but after using it for a month, I'm extremely happy with my purchase. I was slightly concerned about not being able to use standard headphones but bought an adapter so this hasn't been an issue. Quick delivery by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery , great phone. A great buying experience. Pleased. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. One main drawback for me
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Though screen protectors are a pain to get if you actually want to use the fingerprint scanner after. I couldn't find any good ones so I have to use it without a screen protector and just use a wallet case instead
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to Apple
customer_reviews.text: After being an IOS user for 7 years and Apple purposefully slowing down phones, I wanted a phone that would do a similar job. This phone is simply amazing and has so many additional features alongside an amazing battery life. The quality is much better of that of my previous iPhone XR and has convinced me to never look back!
customer_reviews.author: Beliz

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, best price I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: Good phone at a great price. Battery drains quiet quickly, and the stylus isn't great (lots of unintentional clicking of links when scrolling).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Really not worth the money. Over hyped and over rated. Sent mine straight back.
customer_reviews.author: bradley slavinec

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on the Marketplace and other than a missing charger, its great. Phone works well and going from an older one, its speed and screen are top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy good Value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone, the charge barely lasts the day and the fingerprint reader is a bit hit and miss
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The phone has meet and surpassed expection and the battery life on it is enough to last a full day using almost constantly
customer_reviews.author: kieran

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, not really worth the money you pay for it. I needed to upgrade my phone from an old Note 4. Prefer the old Note 4. This phone is way overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great service
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quick delivery. I requested for the earliest possible deliver before my holiday and the seller kindly delivered the phone ahead of the delivery date. Definitely recommend. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Usman Jafri

customer_reviews.title: Locked Phone - NOT as described!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone from Amazon, not another seller. The phone is locked. Amazon's link for product support gives Samsung support phone number. Samsung told me that they cannot help and I should return the phone to Amazon. Don't trust the product description and don't waste your money. Misleading description ruined my wife's surprise birthday present
customer_reviews.author: Kees S

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy note 10 . Sleek and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a second phone. But I didn't know What to go for Should I buy a cheap 2nd phone. So after all of the thinking I decided to go For the Samsung Galaxy note ten It is an absolute Gem Of a phone. Sleek And stylish. The S pen is An extra special Bonus for me so I can write And pin on the Lock screen. The camera is absolutely gorgeous the pictures are Awesome crisp and clear. Thank you Samsung for the Great phones that's you produce every time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Breckin

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have to migrate
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my tech savvy wife who said: "Dreaded migrating from Microsoft Lumia 930 after years of using loyalty to MS/Nokia phones. But with this phone I had nothing to worry about. It's everything I wanted for business and personal, and more."
customer_reviews.author: Scrybler

customer_reviews.title: Great phone great battery fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Brought this phone for my hubby for xmas and he loves it the battery is great he did have a pixel before but he said Samsung is all the way... great communication from the buyer and fast delivery too will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bumble bee

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is very average upon the android market and probably below average as of 2020. However, do not be fooled, by all means, this is NOT a bad phone, its just that other phones in 2020 are just drastically more better. Moreover getting this phone for £430 is an amazing offer and I cannot fault it especially when this comes to storage and the camera lenses do pack a bit of a punch.
customer_reviews.author: Big shaz

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Design Fault
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy Note 10 is seriously flawed. The wireless charging antenna has a temperature sensor that fails after about a year. After that, it will not charge, flagging the error message that it is too cold to charge. This is a serious design fault and you should not buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gollynick

customer_reviews.title: Graceful look
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from note 9, I am in love with product soothing dazzling speaker sound.nice look, smaller than note 9 All in all I liked it.Still using have learn more about product, so for look graceful and speaker are nice, mobile memory not enough and no backup memory to support
customer_reviews.author: shahid farooq

customer_reviews.title: the phone was not what i received,the add was incorrect
customer_reviews.text: it said it was a note 10 what came was a note 10 plus ,i wanted the 10 so i could use the memory card from my last phone but the 10 plus only takes 2 sims,so not happy , the phone works well expect for the battery,,it was in as new condition .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Edge screen is awful
customer_reviews.text: Really dislike the edge screen layout Always getting phantom clicks when doing nothing more than holding the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Radar

customer_reviews.title: Fully featured as much as i need it to be.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for notes as i travel and work. Otherwise it is a good smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Noel Dunn

customer_reviews.title: The best smartphone in the market at the moment
customer_reviews.text: With the few reviews I have seen here, I thought of posting my review here. I usually don't post any review. I moved from Samsung Galaxy Note 8 to the Note 10 plus. If you are a fan of the Note series, don't even think twice if you want to buy this phone, just go for it. Believe me, this is the best phone in the market at the moment. The only downside is the lack of a headphone jack. However, this is not an issue for me since I usually use wireless earbuds. I can't find any fault with this phone and I believe with time, people will come to realize what this phone offers.
customer_reviews.author: MohammedDB

customer_reviews.title: Superb phone - Expensive but cheaper than competition
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this phone from Amazon but tried it in store. The phone is fantastic. The design and use is definitely very good. With all phones, one can never say this is the best because there is always a newer one out a few months later. Some people complain about the price. It is true that the phone is expensive but all top end phones are similarly priced. iPhone 10s Max is £1500 for 512GB version. That is £300 more than similar Note 10+ 512GB. Somehow many people praise Apple but complain about Note 10 price. Currently I use an iPhone 8 and will buy a note 10 in a few months once it is a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: edomr

customer_reviews.title: Love it best  phone  of  2019  going to to 2020
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality phone for the price and good service from Samsung
customer_reviews.author: owen wint

customer_reviews.title: It's a fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing and the design is just great it as 8GB ram and 256 internal storage well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: paul starbuck

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Just a great overall phone with a very good camera
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Gomes

customer_reviews.title: No SD card slot
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have an sd card slot all the other variants do
customer_reviews.author: imi

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Note10 Mobile Phone; Sim Free Smartphone - Aura Black (UK version)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Aura Black| Style Name:UK Version| Pattern Name:Note10Limited availability - ask your account manager for more details!.
feature_bullets: Screen: The power phone in a beautifully balanced, compact design. Its stunning 6.3-Inch infinity-o display lets you see every detail in everything you watch
Camera: giving you the power to create like a pro
Innovative S Pen: rewrite how you use your phone with a powerful S Pen
Intelligent battery: smarter power that gets you through your most demanding days
What's in the box: Samsung Galaxy Note10 smartphone with pre-installed screen protector, user manual, UK phone charger, earphones

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
